AT.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
AT.description: Nach einem erneuten großen Erfolg des Freizeitparks in Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: Mini-Land Mayhem! hat sich die Mini-Mario AG dazu entschlossen, dieses Jahr einen Mini-Spielzeug-Jahrmarkt zu veranstalten. Allerdings hat sich dieses Mal Donkey Kong mit Pauline zusammengetan, um im Rahmen des Jahrmarkts einen Spielbereich namens „Minispiele“ zu betreiben. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move ist ein bezauberndes Einzelspieler-Puzzlespiel im Mario vs. Donkey Kong-Universum. Neben vielen altbekannten Charakteren aus der Mario-Reihe triffst du in diesem Spiel selbstverständlich auf Mario und Donkey Kong – als mechanische Spielfiguren zum Aufziehen. Dieses Spiel beinhaltet einen leicht zu bedienenden Level-Editor, in dem du deine eigenen Inhalte erstellen und mit deinen Freunden teilen kannst. Kannst du Mario und seinen Freunden in diesem großartigen Puzzlespiel zur Seite stehen?

movies.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move Trailer
Mario and Donkey Kong: Ankündigungstrailer
Mario and Donkey Kong™ MotM: Mario-Marsch
Mario and Donkey Kong™ MotM: Erstellen & Teilen
Mario and Donkey Kong™ MotM: Rätselpalast

AU.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
AU.description: After yet another huge success with the theme park in Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: Mini-Land Mayhem!, the Mario Toy Company decides to host a Mini Toy Carnival this year. This time, however, Donkey Kong has joined with Pauline to run a game arcade inside the carnival. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move is a charming single-player puzzle game set in the Mario vs. Donkey Kong universe. Several Mario-universe characters appear in this game and of course you will meet Mario and Donkey Kong represented as mechanical clockwork toys. This game features a simple-to-use Create & Share mode which allows you to create your own content that you can share with your friends. Can you help Mario and his friends in this great puzzle game?

movies.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move Trailer

BG.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
BG.description: After yet another huge success with the theme park in Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: Mini-Land Mayhem!, the Mario Toy Company decides to host a Mini Toy Carnival this year. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move is a charming single-player puzzle game set in the Mario vs. Donkey Kong universe. Several Mario-universe characters appear in this game and of course you will meet Mario and Donkey Kong represented as mechanical clockwork toys. This game features a simple-to-use Create & Share mode which allows you to create your own content that you can share with your friends. Can you help Mario and his friends in this great puzzle game?

BE.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
BE.description: Suite au succès rencontré par le parc d'attractions dans Mario vs Donkey Kong™: Pagaille à Mini-Land !, l'entreprise Jouets Mario & Co. a décidé d'organiser un carnaval de mini-jouets cette année ! Donkey Kong change de camp et fait cette fois-ci équipe avec Pauline. À eux deux, ils gèrent une salle d'arcade en plein cœur du carnaval. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move est un jeu de casse-tête en solo très mignon se déroulant dans l'univers Mario vs. Donkey Kong. Retrouvez plusieurs personnages issus de l'univers Mario ainsi que Mario et Donkey Kong en mini-jouets. La fonction Créer et partager vous permet de créer très facilement vos propres niveaux et de les partager avec vos amis. À vous de prêter main forte à Mario et ses amis dans ce fantastique jeu de casse-tête !

This game features a simple-to-use Create & Share mode which allows you to create your own content that you can share with your friends. Can you help Mario and his friends in this great puzzle game?

ES.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
ES.description: Tras el rotundo éxito de su parque de atracciones en Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: ¡Megalío en Minilandia!, este año la fábrica de juguetes Mario ha decidido organizar una feria de Minis. Esta vez, Donkey Kong se une a Pauline para regentar una sala recreativa que se encuentra en el recinto ferial. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move es un fascinante juego de puzle para un jugador ambientado en el universo de Mario vs. Donkey Kong. Aparecen varios de los personajes que habitualmente acompañan a Mario y, por supuesto, incluye las versiones en juguete mecánico de Mario y Donkey Kong. El modo Crea y comparte te permite crear tus propios niveles de manera sencilla y compartirlos con tus amigos. ¡Échales una mano a Mario y sus amigos en este fantástico juego de puzle!

IT.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
IT.description: Dopo un altro enorme successo del parco tematico in Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: Mini-Land Mayhem!, la Mario Toy Company ha deciso quest'anno di organizzare una grande festa dei Mini. Questa volta Donkey Kong si è però unito a Pauline nel gestire una sala di Minigiochi per questo grande evento. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move è un avvincente rompicapo per giocatore singolo, ambientato nel magico universo di Mario vs. Donkey Kong. In questo gioco troverai molti personaggi della famiglia Mario e incontrerai Mario e Donkey Kong stessi sotto forma di giocattoli meccanici. Questo titolo comprende anche un editor di livelli che ti consentirà di creare contenuti aggiuntivi da condividere con i tuoi amici. Riuscirai ad aiutare Mario e gli altri a superare tutte le sfide di questo rompicapo?

NL.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
NL.description: Na het zoveelste enorme succes met het pretpark in Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: Mini-Land Mayhem! besluit de Mario Toy Company om dit jaar een festival te houden. Deze keer, echter, runnen Pauline en Donkey Kong op dit evenement samen een speelhal. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move is een grappig puzzelspel voor één speler dat zich afspeelt in het universum van Mario vs. Donkey Kong. Je zult verschillende personages uit het Mario-universum tegenkomen en natuurlijk ontmoet je ook Mario en Donkey als opwindpoppetjes. Het spel kent de spelstand Create & Share waarmee je op simpele wijze je eigen content kunt creëren die je vervolgens kunt delen met je vrienden. Kun jij Mario en zijn vrienden helpen in dit fantastische puzzelspel?

PT.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
PT.description: Após mais um grande sucesso com o parque temático em Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: Mini-Land Mayhem!, a Mario Toy Company decide organizar este ano um Mini Toy Carnival. No entanto, desta vez Donkey Kong e Pauline juntam-se para organizar um jogo de arcada dentro do parque de diversões. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move é um encantador jogo de puzzle de jogador único, que tem como cenário o universo de Mario vs. Donkey Kong. Para além dos vários personagens do universo de Mario que aparecem neste jogo, terás ainda a oportunidade de encontrar bonecos de corda baseados em Mario e Donkey Kong. Este jogo possui também um modo Create & Share de simples utilização, que te permite criar os teus próprios conteúdos, os quais podem ser partilhados com os teus amigos. Conseguirás ajudar Mario e os seus amigos neste jogo de puzzle fantástico?

RU.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
RU.description: Парк развлечений в игре Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: Mini-Land Mayhem! пользовался огромным успехом среди игроков, и компания Mario Toy Company решила продолжить веселье. В этом году она порадует вас пестрым карнавалом мини-игрушек (Mini Toy Carnival)! Даже Донки Конгу нашлос ь место в праздничной суете: вместе с Pauline он будет управлять игровым залом (game arcade). Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move – увлекательная головоломка из серии Mario vs. Donkey Kong, разработанная для одного игрока. Вас ждут старые знакомые из серии игр с участием Марио и, конечно же, маленькие механические Марио и Донки Конги. Дайте волю фантазии: в режиме Create & Share вы сможете с легкостью создавать контент и делиться им с друзьями. Присоединяйтесь к Марио и Ко! Веселье гарантировано!

Mario and Donkey Kong™ MotM: Create & Share

SE.name: Mario and Donkey Kong™: Minis on the Move
SE.description: After yet another huge success with the theme park in Mario vs. Donkey Kong™: Mini-Land Mayhem!, the Mario Toy Company decides to host a Mini Toy Carnival this year. This time, however, Donkey Kong has joined with Pauline to run a game arcade inside the carnival. Mario and Donkey Kong: Minis on the Move is a charming single-player puzzle game set in the Mario vs. Donkey Kong universe. Several Mario-universe characters appear in this game and of course you will meet Mario and Donkey Kong represented as mechanical clockwork toys. This game features a simple-to-use Create & Share mode which allows you to create your own content that you can share with your friends. Can you help Mario and his friends in this great puzzle game?
